Judul: CO2 Sequestration Through Direct Aqueous Mineral Carbonation Of Red Gypsum
Abstrak:
In this study, the physical and chemical characteristics and direct aqueous mineral carbonation of red
gypsum have been investigated. The characterization studies showed that red gypsum is a very potential
feedstock for mineral carbonation. It is mainly consisted of CaO, Fe2O3 and SO3 along with some impurities. On the other hand, the carbonation results showed that direct aqueous carbonation of red
gypsum resulted in CaCO3 and FeCO3 production, however, the carbonates purity and carbonation efficiency are still very low
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Mohammad Afkhami Karaei, Hossein Hamidi, Erfan Mohammadian, Bizhan Honarvar
Kata Kunci: Red gypsum, Titanium dioxide, Characterization, Direct mineral carbonation, Carbon dioxide sequestration
